message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you! Given its value, I'm offering it at $11,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $11,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,250? This offer stands as a sign of my commitment to getting this product into your capable hands.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $11,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
